# userSpecifiedDevices

**Type Property**

Includes only new devices the user pairs via DeviceDiscoveryUI’s `DevicePairingView()`.

## Declaration

```swift
static let userSpecifiedDevices: WAPublisherListener.Devices
```

## Discussion

Only applicable to use with the `DevicePairingView()` API. Will throw an error if used with a `NetworkListener`.

## Selecting specific devices

- **selected(_:)**: Includes only the preselected paired devices in the provided dictionary.
- **selected(_:)**: Includes only the preselected paired devices in the provided list.

items.description: Includes only the preselected paired devices in the provided dictionary.
items.name: selected(_:)

items.description: Includes only the preselected paired devices in the provided list.
items.name: selected(_:)
